T02D1231:43a-1: ga na tsa kra bi dhi n'a ma /
T02D1231:43a-3: tshogs kyi 'khor lo'i cho ga zhes bya ba /
T02D1231:43a-4: dpal rdo rje mkha' 'gro ma la phyag 'tshal lo //
T02D1231:43a-5: nam mkha'i mdog la dri med rgyas pa sbyor bas rnam par rol //
T02D1231:43a-6: bdud bzhi zhabs kyis rnam par mnan pas 'jig rten legs par skyong //
T02D1231:43a-7: mkha' 'gro ma yi gtso bzang 'jigs pa de la phyag 'tshal te /
T02D1231:43a-8: 'gro ba rnams kyi bsod nams tshogs ni rab tu bsags pa'i phyir /
T02D1231:43a-9: rgyud rnams kun gyi mchog tu bsngags pa'i tshogs chen
T02D1231:43a-10: nyon mongs bsreg / thabs dang shes rab rol pas
T02D1231:43a-11: cho ga bsdus pa bshad par bya'o //
T02D1231:43a-12: de la dang por tshogs 'dod pas //
T02D1231:43a-13: rig pa yis ni rjes 'brangs nas //
T02D1231:43a-14: yongs su dang ba'i dad pa yis //
T02D1231:43a-15: bla ma dang ni 'dod lha gzung//
T02D1231:43a-16: de la sangs rgyas thob pa'i rgyu //
T02D1231:43a-17: bsod nams ye shes tshogs yin te //
T02D1231:43a-18: tshogs las dngos grub mchog tu 'gyur //
T02D1231:43a-19: de phyir rtag tu tshogs bsag bya //
T02D1231:43a-20: ye shes mngon par rtogs pa ste //
T02D1231:43a-21: bsod nams rnam pa mang po yod kyang //
T02D1231:43a-22: rang gi lha yi 'khor lo yis //
T02D1231:43a-23: 'dod yon lnga sbyor bla na med //
T02D1231:43a-24: de phyir de yi cho ga ni //
T02D1231:43a-25: yar ro'i brgyad dang bcu bzhi dang //
T02D1231:43a-26: bco lnga dag ni rab tu bsngags //
T02D1231:43a-27: de bzhin mar ngo'i brgyad dang ni //
T02D1231:43a-28: bcu bzhi dang ni bco lnga la //
T02D1231:43a-29: mkhas pa yis ni 'khor lo bskor //
T02D1231:43a-30: dur khrod dam ni shing gcig gam //
T02D1231:43a-31: skyed mos tshal lam kun dga' dang //
T02D1231:43a-32: de bzhin rang gi khyim dang ni //
T02D1231:43a-33: gzhan yang dben pa'i khyim rnams su //
T02D1231:43a-34: sa gzhi pa yi lngas byugs la //
T02D1231:43a-35: me tog dri zhim sna tshogs dgram //
T02D1231:43a-36: de la dang por tshogs 'dod pas //
T02D1231:43a-37: tshogs kyi slob dpon dge slong la //
T02D1231:43a-38: rgyud rnams mang po shes gyur pa //
T02D1231:43a-39: rnal 'byor brtson la rtog pa spangs //
T02D1231:43a-40: de nyid bcu shes snying rje che //
T02D1231:43a-41: dam tshig ldan la 'dod pa chung //
T02D1231:43a-42: yang na de 'dra'i slob dpon la //
T02D1231:43a-43: sems bskyed pa nas snyan gsan dbab //
T02D1231:43a-44: de nas gzhan yang dam tshig ldan //
T02D1231:43a-45: bla ma la gus rtog pa chung //
T02D1231:43b-0: 'khon gcugs med cing rang dad @43b pa'i ;
T02D1231:43b-1: / lha grangs mi la gsol ba gdab //
T02D1231:43b-2: mgron rnams dga' bar bya ba'i phyir //
T02D1231:43b-3: de la sha dang chang dag dang //
T02D1231:43b-4: 'bras chan la du khur ba dang //
T02D1231:43b-5: de bzhin bza' dang bca' ba dang //
T02D1231:43b-6: btung dang de bzhin bldag dang myang //
T02D1231:43b-8: tshogs ni 'byor tshad sta gon bya //
T02D1231:43b-9: de bzhin spos dang byug pa dang //
T02D1231:43b-10: dri dang me tog phreng mchog dang //
T02D1231:43b-11: mar me bdug pa sna tshogs gzhag / de nas slob dpon stan bzang la //
T02D1231:43b-12: dbus phyogs su ni yang dag bzhugs //
T02D1231:43b-13: de bzhin stan ni bzang po la //
T02D1231:43b-15: rnal 'byor ma yi g-yon du bsham //
T02D1231:43b-16: de nas slob dpon bdag nyid kyis //
T02D1231:43b-17: rdo rje dang bcas thig le yis //
T02D1231:43b-18: lus ngag yid kyi gnas gsum du //
T02D1231:43b-19: kun la byin gyis brlab par bya //
T02D1231:43b-20: de bzhin me tog phreng mchog gis //
T02D1231:43b-21: thod dang ga shal rnam par brgyan //
T02D1231:43b-22: des na bdud rtsi bzang po'i chus //
T02D1231:43b-23: kha zas kun la bsre bar bya //
T02D1231:43b-24: gtso bo de yi bya ba'i las //
T02D1231:43b-25: snod rnams aa las thod par bsam //
T02D1231:43b-26: de nas bdud rtsi lnga bsams te //
T02D1231:43b-27: yang ni h'um las rdo rje bsgom //
T02D1231:43b-28: de 'og las kyi rlung dang me //
T02D1231:43b-29: sbar nas thod nang rdo rje lhung //
T02D1231:43b-30: de yis lha yi bdud rtsir bsam //
T02D1231:43b-31: bdud rtsi byung nas sngags kyang brjod //
T02D1231:43b-32: yang na rdo rje las kyang ni //
T02D1231:43b-34: bdud rtsi bkug nas ye shes dang //
T02D1231:43b-35: ro gcig tu ni gsum bsres pas //
T02D1231:43b-36: rdo rje bdud rtsi zhes bya ste //
T02D1231:43b-37: rang bzhin dag pa'i sngags kyang brjod //
T02D1231:43b-38: de dag tshogs kyi 'khor lo yi //
T02D1231:43b-39: cha ni dang po yin par 'dod //
T02D1231:43b-40: de nas rnal 'byor ma rnams kyis //
T02D1231:43b-41: chu gnas su ni ram las kyang //
T02D1231:43b-43: de dbus bam las padma brgyad //
T02D1231:43b-44: de steng lha yi 'khor lo bsam //
T02D1231:43b-45: kha ni hom khung rab bsams te //
T02D1231:43b-46: lag gnyis h'um las rdo rje yi //
T02D1231:43b-47: gzar bu gnyis ni yang dag bsgom //
T02D1231:43b-48: rang rang so so'i lha ru bsam //
T02D1231:43b-49: rdo rje'i bzlas pa'i tshul gyis ni //
T02D1231:43b-50: mi rtog sems kyis gsang sngags bzlas //
T02D1231:43b-51: nang gi rnal 'byor nges pa ni //
T02D1231:43b-52: thugs kyi 'khor lo zhes byar brjod //
T02D1231:43b-53: des ni tshogs kyi 'khor lo yi //
T02D1231:44a-2: de nas tshogs kyi bdag po yis //
T02D1231:44a-3: so so'i mdun du mandala bya //
T02D1231:44a-4: de rjes kun la mchod pa'i tshogs //
T02D1231:44a-5: yongs su dag pa mdun du gzhag / me tog thogs te mdun gnas nas //
T02D1231:44a-6: byang chub tu ni sems bskyed nas //
T02D1231:44a-7: rdo rje 'dzin sogs dgongs su gsol /
T02D1231:44a-8: bdag ni tshogs kyi khyad par 'di //
T02D1231:44a-9: dad pa'i sems kyis 'bul lags na //
T02D1231:44a-10: ci bde bar yang bzhes su gsol //
T02D1231:44a-11: de 'dra'i tshig gis gsol btab nas //
T02D1231:44a-12: me tog dag ni gtor bar bya //
T02D1231:44a-13: de nas gtso bos lha rnams la //
T02D1231:44a-14: ae ma'o ye shes chen po rnams //
T02D1231:44a-15: tshogs chen 'bar bas nyon mongs bsreg /'di 'dra'i bde ba thob nas ni //
T02D1231:44a-16: kun gyis aa ho su kha brjod //
T02D1231:44a-17: de nas yun gyis mgrin gcig tu //
T02D1231:44a-18: sngags 'di dag ni brjod par bya //
T02D1231:44a-19: aa ho su kha bhaksha n'am //
T02D1231:44a-20: aa ho su kha pr'a ya n'am /
T02D1231:44a-21: ma h'a mu dra siddhi na pra pa tha ta ni ra te na /
T02D1231:44a-23: de nas dang po'i rnal 'byor las //
T02D1231:44a-24: h'um gi sgra dang rab ldan zhing //
T02D1231:44a-25: phyag rgya lnga dang rab ldan pas //
T02D1231:44a-26: gzar bus bdud rtsi blangs nas ni //
T02D1231:44a-27: 'bar ba'i nang du bsreg par bya //
T02D1231:44a-28: thod pa dum bu gcig pa'i nang //
T02D1231:44a-29: bdud rtsi yis ni bkang nas kyang //
T02D1231:44a-30: gtso bo la ni rnal 'byor mas //
T02D1231:44a-31: padma'i phyag rgyas drang bar bya //
T02D1231:44a-32: de bzhin gcig nas gcig tu ni //
T02D1231:44a-33: bskor ba phyag rgya'i 'khor lo ste //
T02D1231:44a-34: de dag tshogs kyi 'khor lo yi //
T02D1231:44a-35: cha ni gsum pa yin par 'dod //
T02D1231:44a-36: de nas gtso bos zab mo'i chos //
T02D1231:44a-37: mnyam par gzhag pas bsgrub par bya //
T02D1231:44a-38: rdo rje de yis bde bskul bya //
T02D1231:44a-39: bde ba chen po'i tshogs rnams kyis //
T02D1231:44a-40: yon bdag tshogs ni bsag pa'i phyir //
T02D1231:44a-41: zab mo'i chos ni sgrogs zhes bya //
T02D1231:44a-42: de ltar thabs dang shes rab tshogs //
T02D1231:44a-43: go rims bzhin du chos smra ba //
T02D1231:44a-44: dam chos gsung gi 'khor lo yin //
T02D1231:44a-45: de nas gtso bos bskul nas ni //
T02D1231:44a-46: rnam par rtog bral rol pa yis //
T02D1231:44a-47: thabs kyi gal te shes rab glu //
T02D1231:44a-48: yang na de las bzlog bya ba //
T02D1231:44a-49: sku dang gsung gi 'khor lo yin //
T02D1231:44a-50: de dag go rims ji bzhin du //
T02D1231:44a-51: kun gyis 'khor lo bskor bar bya //
T02D1231:44a-52: de nas phan tshun rim pa la //
T02D1231:44b-0: de'ang yon gyi @44b bdag pos ni //
T02D1231:44b-1: mchod phyir rang gi chung ma'am //
T02D1231:44b-2: de la sogs pa'i bud med ni //
T02D1231:44b-3: mdzes ma dag ni dbul ba'am //
T02D1231:44b-5: gtso bo la ni gsol ba gdab //
T02D1231:44b-6: de nas gtso bos lha rnams kun //
T02D1231:44b-7: dam tshig la ni gnas bya'i phyir //
T02D1231:44b-8: bde ba chen po'i rnal 'byor gyis //
T02D1231:44b-9: yol ba'i nang du dam 'khyud de //
T02D1231:44b-10: stan bde ba la snyoms zhugs te //
T02D1231:44b-11: ji srid bde bar gnas kyi bar //
T02D1231:44b-12: de srid khams gsum po rnams stong //
T02D1231:44b-13: yid kyis gcig tu byas nas ni //
T02D1231:44b-14: ga pur lce yis blangs nas kyang //
T02D1231:44b-15: lha rnams kun la thig le dag //
T02D1231:44b-16: gdong gi padma'i nang du btang //
T02D1231:44b-17: de ni ye shes bde ba ste //
T02D1231:44b-18: longs spyod 'khor lor zhugs par bya //
T02D1231:44b-19: de ltar rim pa ji lta bar //
T02D1231:44b-20: der ni lha rnams ma lus kun //
T02D1231:44b-21: bdag byin brlab pa'i rim pa yis //
T02D1231:44b-22: stan bde ba la snyoms zhugs nas //
T02D1231:44b-23: rang gi bdud rtsi rang gis bza'/
T02D1231:44b-24: de bde thabs kyis yang dag mkhyen //
T02D1231:44b-25: sems kyi bde ba gang skyes pa //
T02D1231:44b-27: de dag yongs su ma grub na //
T02D1231:44b-28: sman dang mar gyi khu ba yis //
T02D1231:44b-29: snying ga ru ni byugs nas kyang //
T02D1231:44b-30: dal gyis cung zad mnye bar bya //
T02D1231:44b-31: de yang sems kyi bde ba che //
T02D1231:44b-32: thugs kyi 'khor lo nges par yin //
T02D1231:44b-33: de ltar yongs su sbyor ba'i tshogs //
T02D1231:44b-34: rang rang lha yi rnal 'byor gyis //
T02D1231:44b-35: longs spyod rnams ni yon phul nas //
T02D1231:44b-36: gser dang rin chen la sogs dang //
T02D1231:44b-37: dar dang ras dang yang na sman //
T02D1231:44b-38: gtso bo dang ni bde ba yi //
T02D1231:44b-39: shes rab tu ni mnyam pa ste ;
T02D1231:44b-40: / de dag gzhan las nyis 'gyur tshad //
T02D1231:44b-41: gzhan la de yi phyed phul nas //
T02D1231:44b-42: yon gyi bdag pos dge bskul bya //
T02D1231:44b-43: dkyil 'khor me tog bcas ldan dang //
T02D1231:44b-44: lag par me tog thogs nas ni //
T02D1231:44b-45: tshig ni 'di skad brjod par bya //
T02D1231:44b-46: rdo rje 'dzin sogs dgongs su gsol //
T02D1231:44b-47: khyed la rab tu dad pa yis //
T02D1231:44b-48: mchod pa'i tshogs ni rab phul nas //
T02D1231:44b-49: bdag mtha' sems can ma lus rnams //
T02D1231:44b-50: 'khor ba'i sdug bsngal spangs nas ni //
T02D1231:44b-51: bde chen rdo rje 'dzin rgyal shog / de nas de yi spro skyed phyir //
T02D1231:44b-52: gtso bos tshig 'di brjod par bya //
T02D1231:45a-0: ae ma'o sems can chen po @45a * //
T02D1231:45a-2: sangs rgyas rnams kyis de ring ni //
T02D1231:45a-3: khyod la rab tu dgongs 'gyur te //
T02D1231:45a-4: sangs rgyas nyid du 'gyur bas na //
T02D1231:45a-5: 'bras bu chen po mthong ba ste //
T02D1231:45a-6: yid ches pa yis brtson par bya //
T02D1231:45a-7: de dag bsod nams kyi gzhir ro //
T02D1231:45a-8: de nas lhag dang phud bsreg te //
T02D1231:45a-9: 'byung po kun la gtor ma ni //
T02D1231:45a-10: rnal 'byor phun sum tshogs pas btang //
T02D1231:45a-11: me tog la sogs bsdus nas ni //
T02D1231:45a-12: thig le dag ni dbyi bar bya //
T02D1231:45a-13: rang rang lha yi rnal 'byor ni //
T02D1231:45a-14: ting 'dzin sngags dang phyag rgyas ni //
T02D1231:45a-15: 'gro ba'i don du gshegs gsol gdab //
T02D1231:45a-16: de nas gtso bos lha tshogs la//
T02D1231:45a-17: dam tshig bstan par bya ba'i phyir //
T02D1231:45a-18: dmyal sogs sdug bsngal mthong nas ni //
T02D1231:45a-19: tshul 'di smra bar ma byed brjod //
T02D1231:45a-20: bdag gis tshogs bsgrub don byas pas //
T02D1231:45a-21: dge ba dri med gang thob des //
T02D1231:45a-22: tshogs gnyis tshogs ni bsags nas kyang //
T02D1231:45a-23: 'gro kun rdo rje 'dzin thob shog / tshogs kyi
T02D1231:45a-24: 'khor lo'i cho ga / slob dpon dombi he ru
T02D1231:45a-25: ka'i zhal snga nas mdzad pa rdzogs so /
T02D1231:45a-27: // / rgya gar gyi mkhan po dzny'a na a'a kar
